post.html:
Together with Carlos Serrada, a friend in the same Language Theory class (Official name: Traductores e Interpretadores), we made a Ruby interpreter for the “Retina” language, made up by Prof. David Lilue. With it, you can programmatically draw simple bitmaps with a simple syntax.

We called the Ruby interpreter for Retina language Retyna, and made that website for its code and documentation.

frontmatter.title: Retyna: A Ruby interpreter for Retina
frontmatter.description: Homemade Ruby interpreter for Retina language
